title: Phonecert
lyrics: igeon sesangeseo, jeil bitsan dandok gongyeon, gasu neun nago gwan gaegeun neo hana, hwarye ohan maki i je got, olla gagi jeone, geu jeo myeot gajiman juuihaejweo yo. sesan geseo jeil, pye onhan oseul gara ipgo, jeil joahaneun jarie nuw eo, baeteo riga badang aji anke, Joshimhago, tonghwa sangtaereul hangsang yujihaejweo yo. deutgo shibeun norae reul mal ma nae, Everything, ipi shimshimhal ttae neun, neomu budamjujin malgo, pyeonha ge deureojweo, anim naega neomu tteollinik ka. ojik neoegeman gamdong jeogin nor ae, ojik neoreul usge hagi wihan ko neo, nega neomu seolle, jam mot deulge mandeul geoya, jigeumiya keuge sori jilleoj weo. nugub oda teukbyeol han, neoye chwih yangeul ara, dalkom hande seulpeun deut, ajjilha ge (majji), geunde daeum gogi jungyohae, boll yum nopyeobwa, gieok nani uri geu nal, geu no rae . naega neomu jinji hae boyeo do, utjima, nuga bwado wanbyeo khan noraen eun, mani yeonseuphan bu buneul, neo ttae mune teullijana, ajik naneun neomu tteollinik ka. ojik neoegeman gamdong jeogin nor ae, ojik neoreul usge hagi wihan ko neo, nega neomu seolle, jam mot deulge mandeul geoya, jigeumiya keuge sori jille o. i gongyeon eun geoye, da kkeutna gago isseo, eottaenneun ji malhaej weo munja ro, neomu na ashwipji man jollin geo, imi algo isse o, gidaehaejweo majimak gok, i jungeseodo jeil. gamdongj eogin nor ae, ojik neoreul usge hagi wihan ko neo, nega neomu seolle, jam mot deulge mandeul geoya, jigeu miya jeil weonhaneun geol malhae, e otteon nor aereul, dashi deutgo shipeo? sashil naega weonhae, nega neomu seolle, jam mot deulji moreuj iman, aengko liya keuge sori jilleojweo. igeon sesangeseo, jeil bitsan dandokkongyeon, gasu neun nago gwan gaegeun neo ha na.
